text: Beaver Creek is a stream in Mower and Fillmore counties, in the U.S. state of Minnesota. It is a tributary of the Upper Iowa River. Beaver Creek was probably named for the North American beavers which inhabit the stream. ==See also== *List of rivers of Minnesota ==References== Category:Rivers of Fillmore County, Minnesota Category:Rivers of Mower County, Minnesota Category:Rivers of Minnesota
title: Beaver Creek (Upper Iowa River tributary)
